description: This file defines a React component named ChatInput that provides a chat input interface with @-trigger search, quick actions, reference insertion, and integrated live search functionality. It manages user input, overlay display, keyboard navigation, and references management for a chat-based interface in a project that interacts with Jira and Confluence.

methods.name: ChatInput
methods.description: React functional component implementing a chat input with reference search, quick actions, and overlay management, including keyboard navigation and input handling.
